Docs.summary: Annotates a property on a class that has been annotated with the <see cref="T:System.Data.Services.Client.MediaEntryAttribute">.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `MimeTypePropertyAttribute` takes the name of the property that holds the mime type to associate with the property specified in the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.MediaEntryAttribute>. The property specified is automatically set to the mime type of data when a media resource associated with the media link entry is delay-loaded by the <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.DataServiceContext.LoadProperty%2A> method.
The system also reads the mime type from this property and uses it to set the `Content-Type` header in a POST request for a media link entry. A media link entry is an AtomPub protocol construct for handling binary data and metadata.
